column1: In the present paper, ten new reptilian mRNA transferrin sequences obtained from the Nile crocodile ( NtrF), bearded dragon ( BtrF), Cuban brown anole ( AtrF), veiled and Mediterranean chameleons ( VtrF and KtrF), sand lizard ( StrF), leopard gecko ( LtrF), Burmese python ( PtrF), African house snake ( HtrF), and grass snake ( GtrF) are presented and analyzed.
